sentences.en: "What a dump!" Christabel said, standing in the doorway of the youth hostel.
sentences.cn: “真够脏乱的！”克丽丝特布尔站在青年旅社的门口说道。

sentences.en: a campaign to stop cheap European beef being dumped in West Africa
sentences.cn: 阻止在西非倾销廉价欧洲牛肉的运动

sentences.en: Can I dump my bags in your room?
sentences.cn: 我可以把提包撂在你房里 吗 ?

sentences.en: Half an hour later the curtain finally came down on " the dump Nixon movement ".
sentences.cn: 半小时后, “ 把尼克松抛弃掉 ” 的运动终于收场了.

sentences.en: He had never lost a boat or even been forced to dump a cargo.
sentences.cn: 他从没损失过一只小船或被迫抛弃一批货物.

sentences.en: He left Wilson beside the petrol dump and walked on.
sentences.cn: 他把威尔逊扔在汽油桶旁边,向前走去.

sentences.en: I suggested that we not only dump the two companies, but that we also should ditch any other business not involved in soft drinks.
sentences.cn: 我提议我们不仅要和那两个公司断绝关系，还要抛弃其他任何不涉及软饮料的业务。

sentences.en: It's a bit much expecting me to dump your boyfriend for you.
sentences.cn: 指望我替你甩掉你的男朋友，有点儿过分了吧？

sentences.en: Merrill dumped her suitcase down in the hall.
sentences.cn: 梅里尔把手提箱扔在门厅里。

sentences.en: Ministers believed it was vital to dump the poll tax before the election.
sentences.cn: 大臣们认为在大选前停止征收人头税至关重要。

sentences.en: Our dealers didn't want these cars, so we had to dump them at auctions.
sentences.cn: 我们的承销商都不要这些车子, 因此我们只好贱价拍卖.

sentences.en: Solid's flow can be measured by weigh dump.
sentences.cn: 固体的流量可以由翻斗秤测量.

sentences.en: There are special places where you can dump things you don't want.
sentences.cn: 有一些指定的地方,你可以把不需要的东西倒在那里.

sentences.en: They are sometimes - sensibly - called rear - dump trucks.
sentences.cn: 有时称它为后翻卡车,这个名称倒更为切合实际.

sentences.en: They dump surplus goods abroad.
sentences.cn: 他们向国外倾销过剩货物.

sentences.en: They dump their surplus production on foreign countries.
sentences.cn: 他们向外国倾销剩余产品.

sentences.en: Too much toxic waste is being dumped at sea.
sentences.cn: 太多的有毒废料在向大海里倾倒。

sentences.en: Vicky dumped Neil yesterday.
sentences.cn: 薇姬昨天把尼尔甩了。

sentences.en: We dumped our bags at the nearby Grand Hotel and hurried toward the market.
sentences.cn: 我们把包扔在附近的格兰德旅馆，急匆匆地向市场赶去。

sentences.en: Would you be pleased at the prospect of its being on sale in dump bins?
sentences.cn: 对于它将被陈列在倾销箱中抛售这件事,你能欣然接受 吗 ?

sentences.en: you get dumped on just because of your name.
sentences.cn: 你受此欺辱仅仅是因为你的名字。

words.tran_cn: [车辆] 自动倾卸车；倾卸者；清洁工人
大型垃圾装卸卡车；垃圾大铁桶

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式，北美)诘难，辱骂；亏待，虐待

trans.tran_cn: 垃圾场，脏地方，转存，临时堆积处
trans.tran_en: a place where unwanted waste is taken and left

trans.tran_cn: 倾倒，丢弃，乱放，推卸，倾销，转存，与…断绝关系
trans.tran_en: to get rid of goods by selling them in a foreign country at a much lower price
to get rid of goods by selling them in a foreign country at a much lower price
